query:
UPDATE membershipTiers 
SET features = '["4 workshops per month","Monthly live training","Workshop recordings access","Full access to tools & prompts library (lifetime)","1-hour 1-on-1 monthly","Custom workflows","Tool stack audit"]',
    workshopTokensPerMonth = 4
WHERE slug = 'lite';
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3Mhpd8nk54dx6w3.root --database e9RJaE3TPmF4zsnh5FSQoP --execute UPDATE membershipTiers 
SET features = '["4 workshops per month","Monthly live training","Workshop recordings access","Full access to tools & prompts library (lifetime)","1-hour 1-on-1 monthly","Custom workflows","Tool stack audit"]',
    workshopTokensPerMonth = 4
WHERE slug = 'lite';
